name: nucampbootstrapproject
description: This is a website for a photographer for his business

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin bookings.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/bookings.html && usemin portfolio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
